values.description:
Guided by insights. Driven by passion. Measured by results.

iCrossing UK is a digital marketing agency specialising in data driven strategies to build connected  brands.

The company blends best-in-class digital marketing services — including paid media, search engine optimisation, creative, Web development, social media, UX, research and analytics — to create integrated digital marketing programmes that engage consumers and drive ROI. 

iCrossing UK’s client base includes such recognized brands as The Coca-Cola Company, LG Electronics, The LEGO Group, Heathrow and M&S Bank.

iCrossing UK is part of iCrossing, one of the world’s largest digital marketing agencies, which employs over 900 staff in 17 offices around the globe, including 150 staff based at UK offices in London, Manchester and Brighton.

iCrossing is a unit of Hearst Corporation, one of the nation's largest diversified media companies. 

For more information, please visit www.icrossing.co.uk or contact us at results@icrossing.co.uk
values.name: iCrossing UK

values.description: Front Range Community College, the largest community college in Colorado, offers nearly 100 degree and certificate programs from locations in Boulder County, Larimer County, Westminster, and Brighton, and online. FRCC is the No. 1 transfer institution for the University of Colorado, Colorado State University, and Metropolitan State College of Denver. In addition to a statewide guaranteed-transfer agreement, FRCC has transfer agreements with Regis University and the Colorado School of Mines. FRCC's newest career/technical programs are Clean Energy Technology and Health Information Technology.
values.name: Front Range Community College

values.description:
The Village Automotive Group includes such distinct and respected local dealers as Boston Volvo Village of Allston/Brighton, Charles River Saab, Honda Village of Newton Corner, Nissan Village of North Attleboro, Hyundai Village of Danvers, Volvo Village of Norwell, Audi Norwell, Porsche of Norwell, and our newest location Volvo Village of Danvers.
 
Village Automotive Group Mission Statement
The mission of the Village Automotive Group is to profit from the sale of automobiles, parts and service. We will achieve this by creating an environment for our customers of comfort, trust and respect.
 
This environment will be created through the continued emphasis on employee satisfaction, which leads to greater efficiency and productivity through employee retention.
 
We will strive to teach our employees to establish a daily goal of anticipating and satisfying our customers needs in order to establish a relationship-based business, which cultivates an ever-growing customer base.

values.description:
The Telemarketing Company is one of the the UK's biggest B2B outbound telemarketing agencies. 

Founded in 1990 and based on the Brighton sea front, we work with many of the world's leading organisations. We have an unrivalled track record of providing high quality sales lead generation, appointment setting, data enhancement and market research, in both English and a wide range of other native languages. 

With 200 seats and trained, salaried agents we can deliver high quality results at any scale. MRS, IQCS, AITS, FCA, DMA, TPS and IIP accreditations guarantee best practice and high quality results.

values.description: 99p Stores Ltd was founded by Entrepreneur Nadir Lalani in January 2001. He opened his first store in Holloway in London, and continued to open 3 more stores that year. In 2002 Nadir decided to expand the business throughout the UK. He has rapidly developed 99p Stores and when London Road, Brighton opens this will take the total to 117 stores. He has opened 54 new stores this year (47 of which are ex- Woolworths stores) serving 1 million customers per week!

values.description:
Founded in 2004, XCEND Group sells and implements management & security solutions that transform how IT manages IT.  With a powerful portfolio of Symantec solutions and our own MetriX-branded service management & IT analytics software, we help clients automate the processes associated with the requesting and fulfillment of IT services and gain real-time visibility into every aspect of IT operations.

XCEND Group is headquartered in Brighton, Michigan with offices throughout the U.S.  For more information, please visit www.xcendgroup.com
values.name: XCEND Group

values.description:
London Clubs International (also known as Caesars Entertainment UK) is one of the most established and innovative operators in the casino industry, having been a market leader for over 40 years.

Currently operating under a number of brand names throughout the UK including; the iconic Playboy Club in Mayfair, The Casino at the Empire, The Sportsman, Golden Nugget, The Rendezvous (Brighton and Southend), Manchester235 and Alea Casinos (Nottingham and Glasgow).

A pioneer of loyalty in the industry, LCI was the first to introduce a loyalty scheme; Player Rewards, based on the highly successful Total Rewards scheme used by Caesars Entertainment in the US.  The scheme has over 1.2m members.  LCI was also the first casino in the UK to introduce dynamic leisure facilities to its properties to make them true entertainment destinations, these include celebrity chef restaurants (James Martin and Marco Pierre White) and a sports bar in partnership with Carlsberg.

In 2006, Caesars Entertainment, the world’s largest casino entertainment company and best known for properties such as Caesars Palace, Planet Hollywood and Harrahs acquired LCI.  Being part of this global gaming giant provides unrivalled networks and benefits for customers such as an advanced VIP offering and cross marketing opportunities in Las Vegas and Atlantic City.

Within the community, the company is a corporate supporter of Sports Aid, The Prince’s Trust Business in the Community charity and Crimestoppers as well as making regular contributions to the Gambling Trust which funds research and education programmes to support problem gamblers.  Individual casino brands are also active in their local communities with grass roots initiatives.

London Clubs International is passionate about delivering exceptional gaming entertainment and being part of the Caesars Entertainment family;  inspiring grown-ups to play throughout the world.
values.name: London Clubs International
Chantrey Vellacott DFK
values.description:
Chantrey Vellacott DFK provides accountancy, taxation, and related advisory services. The company’s services include business assurance, taxation, mergers and acquisitions, corporate finance, business recovery, e-business and management consultancy, outsourcing, corporate secretarial, and audit. It also offers online services. 

Our range of services is exceptional for a firm of our size, reflecting the strength of our organisation and our commitment to delivering the expert services our clients require.

We work with quoted companies and privately owned businesses drawn from a wide range of commercial sectors. Our clients include professional partnerships, regulatory bodies, charities and other not-for-profit organisations, public sector bodies and private clients.

Chantrey Vellacott DFK has ten offices in Birmingham, Colchester, Croydon, Leicester, London, Northampton, Reading, Southampton, Stevenage, Brighton and Hove.

CMJ Designs was incorporated in 1999. We have grown in sales volume, gross profit, and net profit every year since our date of incorporation. We currently are located in Brighton, MI
values.name: CMJ Designs, Inc.

Structural Civil and Environmental Consulting Engineers operating nationally in UK. Offices in Brighton, Fareham and St Albans.
Projects in Libya, Saudi Arabia and Caribbean.

STRUCTURAL CONSULTANCY.
Major Buildings for Universities:- Teaching Facilities, Student Accommodation, Laboratories, Sports Facilities, Catering Facilities, Engineering Workshops, Performing Arts Buildings. Up to £50M.

Educational:- Schools, Colleges,Nurseries from £50K to £35M. Full Range of Refurbishment and New Build.

Waste Facilities:- WTF, MRW, EfW, Composting Facility

Residential:- Affordable, Public and Private Houses and Flats up to 20 Storeys in UK (50 Storeys Kuala Lumpur)
One-off Upmarket Houses, UK and Caribbean.

Commercial:- Offices, Manufacturing, Warehouses, Retail Parks.

Small Works/Refurbishment:- From £20K to £15M Capital Value. Historic to 1960's. Steel, RC, Masonry,Timber. Additional Floors on Major Buildings.
Conversion Office to Residential.

CIVIL CONSULTANCY:
Roads, Drainage and Highways on Wide Range of Projects. Public Health Scheming on Projects up to £150M.

ENVIRONMENTAL CONSULTANCY

Environmental Legislation and Guidance.

INTERNATIONAL

Rix & Kay Solicitors LLP
values.description:
Rix & Kay is a leading regional law firm with offices in Brighton & Hove, Seaford, Sevenoaks, and Uckfield.  The firm has grown significantly over the last decade which bears testament to the strength of our client relationships and progressive attitude.  We serve individuals, organisations and businesses across the South East and further afield.    

Rix & Kay is recognised as a leading firm in the latest editions of The Legal 500 and Chambers and Partners in thirteen and eight practice areas respectively.  We can claim significant sector expertise and thirteen of our lawyers are Leaders in their Field.    

Our clients say we are proactive, accessible, tenacious, personable and that we provide sound commercial advice.  96%* say they would be prepared to recommend our services (*based on 4455 surveys since 2005).  We hope you will become one too.

Please find all our current vacancies at:  http://www.rixandkay.co.uk/who-we-are/careers/

The GDST (Girls' Day School Trust) is the leading network of independent girls’ schools in the UK, with nearly 4,000 staff, and 20,000 students between the ages of three and 18. 

As a charity that owns and runs a network of 24 schools and two academies in England and Wales, it reinvests all its income in its schools. 

Founded in 1872, the GDST has a long history of pioneering innovation in the education of girls, and is the largest single educator of girls in the UK (and the UK’s largest educational charity).

GDST schools and Academies:

values.description:
Mayo Wynne Baxter is one of the leading law firms in the South East and provides a comprehensive and personal service to a broad spectrum of local and national clients.

With over 200 staff and teams of solicitors in Brighton, Eastbourne, East Grinstead, Lewes and Seaford, we specialise in all aspects of business law and personal legal services. 

We also offer tailored legal advice to specialist industry sectors throughout the UK including Travel, Leisure and Hospitality, Media and Creative Industries and Agricultural &Rural Affairs.

We are one of only a small number of law firms in England and Wales who have been awarded Lexcel accreditation for Legal Excellence. 

Excellent Service from Outstanding People

values: Travel. (We also offer a range of legal services for families and private individuals).

values.description:
Wired Sussex is a Brighton-based membership organisation for companies and freelancers operating in the digital, media and tech sectors in Sussex.

Our goal is to support our members in their quest to deliver innovation, creativity and growth, and to enhance the reputation of this fast-growing regional cluster on the international stage.

We help our members access talent, workspaces, investment and clients. We run recruitment, training and internship services, we help members find studio and office space, and we help our members promote their services and find new clients.

We also speak up for our members’ collective interests, engaging with national government, the higher education sector, and local and regional authorities.

We believe that the most successful innovations come from below, that there is wisdom in the crowd and that businesses gain from generating social as well as economic value.

address.street1: The FuseBox, Level 4 North, New England House

values.name: Wired Sussex
